intro.text:
You must be the new student.
It's so nice to finally see you!

intro 2.text: I hope you didn't get lost finding this building...

intro 3.text:
I would have started my shift early if you did.
And I'm just not that kind of employee

intro 4.text:
Oh! And don't be shy to ask any questions.
Just raise your right hand.

intro 5.text:
You're also free to keep note of {certain words} I say.
Just tap to remember the keyword and raise your hand for further details
choices:
Nice to meet you too!
Who are you exactly?

who are you 2.text:
As you can see,
I take on many forms.
Animal companions are quite popular with the humans I hear.

who are you 3.text:
But my gods!
It is a pain to be coddled all the time.

who are you 4.text:
But my gods!
It is a pain to be coddled all the time.

who are you 5.text:
At times I just turn into the creature I become.
In both body and mind!

who are you 6.text: Regardless, I just hope you like what I've become for you.

I did not get lost..text:
Oh good!
 That's good to hear...

not lost 2.text: When you have guided so many over the millenia you start to wonder how many of them wanted to end up there in the first place!

not lost 3.text: So, I am happy that you seem to know what you want.

not lost 4.text: I, myself, have had a hard time figuring out what i wanted in my younger days.

What exactly IS your job?.text:
I am a guide.
What sort of guide you ask?
 Well, it depends!

what job 2.text: Depending on who you are, what you believe in, and your state of being, I can be the guide that one either seeks OR needs.

what job 3.text: In the case of this {digital realm} I am a teacher.

main.text:
I will be one of your guides here.
You have brought yourself to this place.
As you have chosen to take on a pursuit into your education!

main 2.text: A post-secondary education to be specific.

main 3.text: And this play space and your avatar in which you possess will be assets to prepare you for your journey into your post-secondary experience!
choices: What exactly will I be learning?
I don't think i have "chosen" anything just yet

learning 2.text: Not many adventurers question the quests they are given. Expectations are often led astray for the lack of such introspection.

learning 3.text: It costed those men and women plenty

learning 4.text: The things you will be learning are the necessary preparations and benefits that are designed to help neurodiverse students transition into their post-secondary education.

learning 5.text: Let me show you some of the buildings you will be entering soon... Each with their own experts.

counseling office 2.text: Here you will learn about your disability. To understand it and the stigma behind it. This is where you will properly start.

Lecture Hall 2.text: High School and Post-Secondary are hardly ever the same thing. Here you will learn exactly what those differences are.

Counselling Office 5.text: I believe that it is you that made the choice to head into post-secondary. Therefore, you must choose your field of study.
I believe that it is you that made the choice to head into post-secondary. Therefore, you must choose your field of study.

Counselling Office 6.text: (The Brave) will make those choices clear.

learning 6.text: We like to take things slow around here. So, many buildings will be kept a secret from you until you have triumphed the first one.

I don't think i have \"chosen\" anything.text: And this play space and your avatar in which you possess will be assets to prepare you for your journey into your post-secondary experience!
choices: What exactly will I be learning?
I don't think i have "chosen" anything just yet

main 4.text: We like to take things slow around here. So, many buildings will be kept a secret from you until you have triumphed the first one.
